Name: Tonic
Description: A tonic made from the Prismatic Spring's water.  Revives a fallen ally.

Name: Wand of Fireball
Description: A darkwood wand.  Fire symbols are carefully etched on the sides.  Invokes Fireball.

Name: Orb of Blindness
Description: A pitch-black orb.  Looking at it makes you unaware of the world around you.  Inflicts Blindness.

Name: Orb of Silence
Description: A white orb.  Looks strangely delicious.  Casts silence when thrown.

Name: Illusion Break Wand
Description: A grounded, dirty wand.  Parts of its handle are unusually smooth.  Casts Illusion Break.
